top_recommendations.title: Color Analysis
top_recommendations.recommendation: High contrast between black and white enhances readability.

top_recommendations.title: Color Analysis
top_recommendations.recommendation: Monochromatic scheme creates a clean and professional look.

top_recommendations.title: Layout & Composition
top_recommendations.recommendation: Circular layout creates a strong focal point.

top_recommendations.title: Layout & Composition
top_recommendations.recommendation: Text placement around the circle may cause readability issues.

top_recommendations.title: Usability
top_recommendations.recommendation: Include a clear call-to-action like 'Book Now' or 'Learn More'.

top_recommendations.title: Usability
top_recommendations.recommendation: Improve visual hierarchy with contrasting colors or sizes.

top_recommendations.title: Accessibility
top_recommendations.recommendation: Add descriptive alt text to the logo.

top_recommendations.title: Accessibility
top_recommendations.recommendation: Consider using more accessible fonts and ensuring text scalability.
